title: Alumni Spotlight: Dr. dr. Andi Afdal Abdullah, MBA, AAK
text: Dr. dr. Andi Afdal Abdullah, MBA, AAK
crumbs: Alumni Spotlight: Dr. dr. Andi Afdal Abdullah, MBA, AAK

title: Alumni Spotlight: Andi Afdal Abdullah
text:
We’re excited to feature Sarah Johnson (Class of 2018) in this month’s alumni spotlight. Sarah has recently launched her own tech startup, InnovateTech Solutions, which focuses on sustainable technology solutions for small businesses.


After graduating with a degree in Computer Science, Sarah began her career at a major tech company where she gained valuable experience in product development and team leadership. Three years later, she took the leap into entrepreneurship.

“The critical thinking skills and problem-solving approach I learned during my studies have been invaluable in building my own company.” - Sarah Johnson




InnovateTech Solutions specializes in:

Sustainable software development
Green technology consulting
Small business digital transformation
Environmental impact assessment tools




Sarah plans to expand her team and is actively looking to hire fellow alumni. She’s also mentoring current students interested in entrepreneurship.




LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/sarahjohnson
Company Website: innovatetech.com
Email: sarah@innovatetech.com


Know an alumnus who should be featured? Submit a nomination

title: About
text:
Our alumni tracking and news platform serves as a central hub for graduates to stay connected, share achievements, and build lasting professional relationships.


To foster lifelong connections among our graduates and provide a platform for professional growth, networking, and community engagement.




Alumni Directory: Searchable database of graduates with professional information
News & Updates: Regular posts about alumni achievements, career moves, and community events
Career Tracking: Monitor professional progression and success stories
Networking: Connect with fellow graduates in your field or location




For questions about the platform or to submit updates, please contact:

Email: admin@alumni.org
Phone: (555) 123-4567
Address: 123 University Ave, Campus City, ST 12345




We respect your privacy and handle all personal information according to our privacy policy. Alumni can control their profile visibility and contact preferences.

title: Welcome to Our New Alumni Platform
text:
We’re thrilled to announce the launch of our new alumni tracking and news platform! This modern, user-friendly website will serve as your central hub for staying connected with fellow graduates and our institution.



Enhanced Alumni Directory: Search by graduation year, major, location, or industry
Regular News Updates: Monthly spotlights, career achievements, and community news
Easy Update Submission: Simple form to share your latest professional updates
Mobile-Friendly Design: Access the platform from any device





Browse the Directory: Reconnect with classmates and discover new connections
Submit Your Updates: Share your career milestones and achievements
Subscribe to Updates: Stay informed about community news and events





Alumni event calendar
Mentorship program matching
Industry-specific networking groups
Career services integration

We’re excited to build this community together and look forward to sharing your success stories!

Questions about the platform? Contact us at admin@alumni.org
crumbs: Welcome to Our New Alumni Platform

title: Submit Alumni Updates
text:
Help us keep our alumni community informed about your latest professional achievements, career moves, and personal milestones.


Note: This is a sample form. In a real implementation, you would use a form service like Formspree, Netlify Forms, or a custom backend.



Full Name: ________________
Graduation Year: ________________
Degree/Major: ________________
Current Email: ________________





Current Position: ________________
Company/Organization: ________________
Industry: ________________
Location: ________________
LinkedIn Profile: ________________




Please share any notable achievements, career moves, awards, or other news you’d like to highlight:




Include in alumni directory
Allow contact from other alumni
Include in news updates/spotlights
Share with current students for mentorship






Updates are reviewed before publication
All information is kept confidential according to your privacy preferences
We typically process submissions within 5-7 business days
High-impact achievements may be featured in our news section




Contact our alumni relations team at admin@alumni.org or call (555) 123-4567.

Thank you for staying connected with our alumni community!

title: Alumni News & Tracking
text: Kabar Terbaru

title: Alumni Spotlight: Dr. dr. Andi Afdal Abdullah, MBA, AAK
text:
Dari Dokter Hingga Direktur
Kami dengan senang hati menampilkan Dr. dr. Andi Afdal Abdullah, MBA, AAK yang kerap disapa dengan “Kanda Afdal” dalam Sorotan Alumni bulan ini. Kanda Afdal merupakan seorang dokter yang menempuh pendidikan Strata-1 (S1) di Fakultas Kedokteran Universitas Hasanuddin dan saat ini sedang menempati posisi sebagai Direktur Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) dan Umum Badan Penyelenggara Jaminan Sosial (BPJS) Kesehatan RI. Melalui lembaga negara tersebut, kanda afdal berperan aktif dalam mewujudkan layanan Jaminan Kesehatan Nasional (JKN) yang humanis dan berkelanjutan.

Perjalanan Kanda Afdal
Berawal dari latar belakang pendidikan sebagai seorang dokter, ia meniti karier dalam dunia medis dengan komitmen dan semangat tinggi. Namun, seiring perjalanan waktu, gairah belajarnya membawanya keluar dari sekat disiplin ilmu kedokteran. Kini, ia justru lebih intens mendalami ekonomi, manajemen, sosial budaya, bahkan politik, bidang-bidang yang memperkaya cara pandangnya terhadap manusia, masyarakat, dan dinamika kehidupan.
Hal ini menjadi bekal Kanda Afdal dalam mendedikasikan dirinya selama lebih dari 10 tahun di PT ASKES. Hingga saat ini beliau aktif berkhidmat di BPJS Kesehatan RI sebagai seorang profesional yang juga menjabat Direktur SDM dan Umum pada lembaga tersebut. Terbaru, beliau terpilih sebagai Ketua IKA Unhas wilayah Jabodetabek untuk periode 2025-2029.
Di luar dunia akademik dan profesional, ia dikenal sebagai sosok yang aktif dan penuh semangat. Ia gemar berolahraga, membaca, dan menulis. Dunia sepakbola pun menjadi bagian tak terpisahkan dari dirinya. Ia adalah penggemar berat AC Milan dan Liverpool, sekaligus mengapresiasi beberapa klub “medioker” yang menurutnya tetap menarik untuk diikuti. Namun, satu kecintaan yang tak tergoyahkan adalah PSM Makassar—klub yang ia dukung sepenuh hati sebagai fans fanatik.

“Ada banyak lagi hal didunia ini yang saya rasa wajib untuk di eksplor… karena diatas langit masih ada langit” - Andi Afdal



Terhubung dengan kanda afdal

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/andi-afdal
Company Website: bpjs-kesehatan.go.id
Email: -


Tahu alumni yang harus kami fitur pada laman ini? nominasikan alumni
